claim(uint256).details: This function can be called by anyoneIf the recipient has already claimed, the function will revertIf the pool is not completed, the function will revertIf the pool is completed but the recipient is not in the recipients list, the function will revert

getPoolIdByName(string).details: If the pool name is not found, the function will revertIf there are multiple pools with the same name, the function will return the latest pool ID

returns._0: bool True if the recipient is in the pool

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

claimableAmount(uint256,address).notice: Get claimable amount of the recipient

deposit(uint256,uint256).notice: Deposit to pool, have to approve spending at token contract before calling

getPoolIdByName(string).notice: Get pool ID by name. Start from latest pool ID.

isInPool(uint256,address).notice: Check if the recipient is in the pool

withdrawRemains(uint256).notice: Withdraw remaining balance of the pool to pool.host
